roleset.name: to throw, give up
roleset.note: CHUCK-V NOTES: Based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Member of VNcls throw-17.1-1. (from chuck.01-v)

role.descr: entity getting rid of something, agent

example.name: transitive
example.text: Last summer , he chucked his 10-year career as a London stockbroker and headed for the mountains .
example.arg: his 10-year career as a London stockbroker
